entry.title: Lorrane Oliveira (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Brazilian Olympic gymnast Lorrane Oliveira (pictured) trained for the circus before starting gymnastics?

entry.title: maintenance of existing software (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that some estimate that maintenance of existing software costs up to nine times as much as creating it in the first place?

entry.title: Lilia Cosman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that at age 15, Lilia Cosman moved from the United States to Romania to compete for Romania's Olympic gymnastics team?

entry.title: Baubau (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Baubau city filed two different budgets at the same time, losing their chance at becoming the capital of Southeast Sulawesi?

entry.title: Jane Wallis Burrell (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 1948 Jane Wallis Burrell became the first CIA officer to die in service?

entry.title: Buq Buq labor camp (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after being freed from Buq Buq labor camp in Italian-occupied Egypt, Libyan Jewish prisoners had to walk home across the desert?

entry.title: Aminata Barrow (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Aminata Barrow is the first female Olympic swimmer for The Gambia?

entry.title: Newton Lower Falls Branch (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Newton Lower Falls Branch was operated with a single electric railcar nicknamed the "Ping-Pong"?

entry.title: a donkey (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after disappearing in 2019, a donkey is now "living his best life" with a wild elk herd?
